members.name: Aaron
members.shortDescription: From Two Wheels to Four Wheels to Home Plate
members.longDescription: Whether he's pedaling a bike, exploring back roads in his truck, closing a real estate deal, or chatting on the ham radio, Aaron is always on the move — and always up for the next game.

members.name: Ron
members.shortDescription: Two Wheels, Many Miles, and Earned Wisdom
members.longDescription: A long-distance motorcycle and bicycle rider, retired IT professional, and household fix-it guy — calling life and the game by the book, offering sage advice when asked, and never surprised when someone else picks up the Ron-end of the stick.

members.name: Shawn
members.longDescription: Shaped by years on the field, a lifetime of umpiring taught him how to lead with fairness and care. Off the field, it's family first, cards on the table, and something good cooking in the kitchen.

members.name: Ben
members.shortDescription: Fairways, Ballfields, and the Perfect Pour
members.longDescription: A veterinarian by trade and a wine expert by passion, Ben mixes golf rounds, world travel, French Canadian charm, and a seriously good palate into his love for the game.

members.name: Ed
members.longDescription: By day he secures systems, by night he camps out of his van or racks up bike miles — Ed keeps life simple, code clean, and calls consistent.

members.name: Jason
members.longDescription: A fast marathoner and proud vegan, Jason brings endurance, discipline, and calm confidence to every inning — no shortcuts, no drama, all the questions.
